extendedInfo.description: This is an animated Live Wallpaper featuring various anime/manga characters from Bleach.A must have for any Bleach fan!At the moment there are four possible images to choose from: * Ichigo silhouette * Ichigo in his Hollow form* Tia Harribel* OrihimeMore characters are coming, look at the list below to find out which ones.--Description--The orbs in the background lose their opacity and size as they rise upwards, simulating Ichigo's reiatsu (and also adds quite a neat effect to the wallpaper).The background gradients can be mixed and matched as much as you want, they are fully configurable.--Upcoming characters--Neliel (Adult form) - Being worked on right now.Zaraki KenpachiGrimmjowPlease send emails about bugs and/or opinions and I'll try to get to it as swift as possible.

reviews.comment: Your wallpaper is messed up aka wont work on the lg spectrum the stuff is there but the pic is so far down that you cant see it

reviews.title: What the person below me said...

reviews.title: Little things
reviews.comment: I like how he looks and the color along with what I\'m assuming is drops of blood floating up? Regardless it looks good. I think that if u click something he should strike it or blood should splatter behind it and wen the app closes and you back on home screen he should have more blood on him and then to clean it off you would shake your phone but that\'s just a thought otherwise this is one of the better backgrounds thus far.

reviews.title: Very Nice
reviews.comment: This works well, I just wish the characters would move or something like a aura and also more characters like grimmejau and ukiora please.

reviews.comment: Amazing wallpaper, though Ichigo hollow\'s hair flowing wouldn\'t be such a bad idea. Hope you will include this feature in yout next update.

reviews.comment: Dev here. Since a lot of people are making requests, I\'ll put a voting system in place so it will be more fair. Stay tuned!

reviews.title: Hell yea!!
reviews.comment: Amazing good sir.. you are truly a gentleman and a scholar for creating this live wallpaper.. my hats off to you. Thank you. Your actions have caused joy to others whom you don\'t even know. Just by making this app. You\'ve succeeded and i envy you for that. Thank you one more time. I look forward to downloading more Apps you\'be created.. anything bleach or dragonball or naruto.. I love them all greatly:):):)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool wallpaper
reviews.comment: Love this show really really love the wallpapers, would be amazing if it matched how much battery life u have and a spiritual pressure aura around each character so that when its full it shows a giant aura and when the battery slowly loses energy so does the aura, but again amazing and cool wallpapers

reviews.title: Decent but needs work

reviews.title: Neat

reviews.title: Its OK :-)
reviews.comment: I\'m a big fan of bleach but was a bit disappointed in this product it says live wall paper and it is but just barely above being a glorified regular wall paper and so few characters.  If they morphed or faded from one to the next I might give it a higher rating. Or if they moved slightly like they were ready to fight I would definitely rate it higher.
reviews.author: Remblie Kain
